title: Arabic 29
text: Ascribe not to any soul that which thou wouldst not have ascribed to thee, and say not that which thou doest not. This is My command unto thee, do thou observe it.

prev.title: Arabic 28
prev.text: Know thou of a truth: He that biddeth men be just and himself committeth iniquity is not of Me, even though he bear My name.

next.title: Arabic 30
next.text: Deny not My servant should he ask anything from thee, for his face is My face; be then abashed before Me.
